entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:16 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -17.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 06:45 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -17.4°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
